responsibilities: Build machine learning and deep learning models based on financial and other modalities like images and text
Devise new research methods to solve bleeding edge problems and work on publishable outcomes
Conduct in-depth analysis of machine learning models and pioneer research methodologies to address cutting-edge challenges

Design and develop robust, scalable pipelines and systems using software engineering best practices
Implement end-to-end solutions, including architecture design, business logic, and deployment
Drive the adoption of rigorous testing practices, ensuring high-quality, reliable ML model releases
Stay updated with advancements in machine learning and related technologies to continuously improve solutions
skills: Strong background in software development principles
Deep understanding of machine learning methodologies
Proficiency in Python for data manipulation
Proficiency in PostgreSQL for database management
Proficiency in Flask for web development
Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and software design patterns
Experience with RESTful APIs and micro-services architecture

analysis: The job responsibilities focus on building machine learning and deep learning models, conducting research, and integrating these models into production systems. While there is mention of working with text as a modality, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or language models (LLMs) such as GPT, BERT, or similar technologies. The skills required include a strong background in software development, proficiency in Python, and experience with machine learning libraries like numpy, scipy, pandas, torch, and scikit-learn. These skills are relevant to general machine learning and deep learning tasks but do not specifically indicate work with GenAI or LLMs. The job description emphasizes software engineering, database management, and web development, which are not exclusive to GenAI or LLMs.
